member.name: T:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart
member.summary: Control that displays Organizational Charts.

remarks.para: To use this control, set the following main properties:
: a hierarchical list of items to be shown on the chart.
: template used to convert the items into visuals.
: property that contains the child items.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .

member.name: M:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Get element references from control template.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.HeaderProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.Header
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent item for this .

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ChildSpacingProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ChildSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between items, in pixels.
member.remarks: In addition to changing this property, you may customize the spacing between items using the property on your .

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorThicknessProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the connecting lines.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorStrokeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the connecting lines.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorDashArrayProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorDashArray
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of values that define the pattern of dashes and gaps used to paint the connecting lines.
member.remarks: The array specifies alternating lengths to stroke and leave blank. Values are expressed as multiples of the property.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorDashOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorDashOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance within the dash pattern where a dash begins.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorDashCapProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorDashCap
member.summary: Gets or sets a that specifies how to paint the ends of dashes in the connecting lines.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorEndLineCapProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorEndLineCap
member.summary: Gets or sets a that specifies how to paint the end of the connecting lines.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorStartLineCapProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ConnectorStartLineCap
member.summary: Gets or sets a that specifies how to paint the start of the connecting lines.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.OrientationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction in which child elements are laid out within the control.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ChildItemsPathProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ChildItemsPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property that contains the collection of child objects.
member.remarks: If you don't specify this property, the control will look for the first property that returns an enumeration of items of the same type as the root item.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.IsCollapsedProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.IsCollapsed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the node is currently displaying its children.
member.remarks:
You may use this property to create organizational charts with nodes that can be collapsed or expanded by users. One simple way to do this is by adding a element to the item template and binding its property to the property of the that represents the given item. For example:
<c1:C1OrgChart> <c1:C1OrgChart.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Name}" /> <CheckBox Margin="4 0" IsChecked="{Binding IsCollapsed, Mode=TwoWay, RelativeSource={RelativeSource AncestorType=c1:C1OrgChart}}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </c1:C1OrgChart.ItemTemplate> </c1:C1OrgChart>
This XAML binds the IsChecked property of the CheckBox to the IsCollapsed property of the C1OrgChart control that contains the item. The user may then collapse or expand the chart by checking the CheckBox.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.OrgChart.C1OrgChart.ChildNodes
member.summary: Gets a list of objects that represent the child nodes under this .
